################
Acknowledgements
################

Floodwater has been developed by `The Water Institute <https://thewaterinstitute.org>`_ with funding from:

* `The Louisiana Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority (CPRA) <http://coastal.la.gov/>`_
* `The Louisiana Watershed Initiative (LWI) <https://watershed.la.gov/>`_
* `The Department of Homeland Security Coastal Resilience Center of Excellence <https://www.coastalresiliencecenter.org/>`_

Floodwater is written by Zach Cobell at The Water Institute with contributions from:

* Lorena Penuela-Cantor (The Water Institute)
* Shintaro Bunya (University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill)
* Brian Blanton (Renaissance Computing Institute [RENCI])
* Matthew Bilskie (University of Georgia)
